replies.msg:
Server【Japan】


麻煩新手巴絲睇咗全攻略先，睇完有咩唔明再問，所有攻略僅供參考

【LIHKG】King's Raid 全攻略


【日服連登公會】


新手巴絲唔好亂入公會，要入就入Lihkg公會
因為你一入錯，要退會入Lihkg公會，就要等足七日先會有奬勵你拎
唔使問有無位，搵到即係有，搵唔到即係無
申請咗邊個公會+ID麻煩填表，優先處理填表巴絲
填完麻煩再係Post度留名話自己填咗表，即有專人為你服務

只限日服適用 - 刷首抽Q&A
所有Q&A僅供參考，各巴絲可自行選擇有愛之英雄作為目標

Q：點解我無得抽嘅？
A：麻煩出Game再入Game睇下自己揀咗咩Ser，目前只有日服先會有得刷廿抽

Q：點樣拎廿抽？
A：打完頭三關教學任務，去右上角信箱拎石同十抽卷

Q：抽邊個Pool好？點解？
A：首推刺客Pool
因為每隻英都會有個人專用嘅
UW = Unique Weapon
UT = Unique Treasure
兩樣係唔同嘅裝備，裝嘅位置唔一樣，可以同時使用，將隻英發揮到最大嘅效果
因為有52隻英，咁就唔一一貼上嚟

全英雄Skill、UT、UW、Artifact整合英文版：
https://maskofgoblin.netlify.com/?item=Kasel

全英雄Skill、UW整合殘體中文版：(非最新版本，所以麻煩連埋第一頁全攻略嚟睇)
http://bbs.ngacn.cc/read.php?tid=12943067&rand=824

全英雄UT殘體中文版：(如果唔知佢講啲英係邊隻去上面全人物圖鑑對/直接問)
http://bbs.ngacn.cc/read.php?tid=13705992

刺客Pool原因：
入面有幾把unique weapon(uw) 同unique treasure(ut)都比較勁
不過最重要係有愛>一切，抽其他pool都得

Q：抽到咩先開局？
A:如果你係跟大圍抽刺客Pool的話
抽中Mirianne既UW/UT，Roi既UW/UT，Epis既UW/UT，都推介大家開局
同埋建議係UT>UW，因為UW 15日會送自選劵，但UT暫時係無劵可以自選，最多隨機
但52隻英幾時先會中到你想要嗰隻...
如果巴絲唔肯定開局與否請上嚟問我哋
都係嗰句，有愛就好

Q：如何刪帳重刷？
A：1：撳左上角個頭像
2：Others
3：Leave
4：之後打句【I agree to delete my account】就搞掂


謹記
將方法將會刪除帳號內資料
所以真係棄先好打

最後希望大家刷到好開局

Q：英雄自選劵揀咩英好?
A：有愛>一切
依隻驚無勁唔勁，只有夾唔夾
同埋官方會因應英雄強弱而作出Buff同Nerf嘅調整
今個版本可能弱勢啲，但下個版本可能變神角都未定
所以不如揀咗有邊隻英係你真係鍾意嘅，想用嘅
再係Post度問下有咩組合可以夾佢，咁會比較好
相信各巴絲都好樂意為新手巴絲們解答的

Q：我抽到依樣嘢又唔係專武，咁係咩嚟?
A：Artifact
英文版：https://maskofgoblin.netlify.com
殘中版：http://bbs.ngacn.cc/read.php?tid=12943067


Q：需唔需要刷首抽架？
A：無首抽依回事，因為唔係抽返嚟，係可以直接用英雄自選卷換返嚟(新英除外)
【新手一定會有一張二星同三星英雄自選劵】

如有更多問題可詳見【LIHKG】King's Raid 全攻略

Hello Raiders
This is GM Orvel.

There are going to be exciting 3 events from 5th April guys!
- April 5th: Hero’s Inn Double Kinship
- April 6th: Hero Training Camp Part.2
- April 12th: Room of Purification Discount

In Hero Training Camp Part.2, you will be able to acquire Skill Books for each class,
so don’t forget to attend the event!

Please find more details below!
---------------------

The 1st Event!

[Hero’s Inn Double Kinship!]





[Event Details]
1. Period: Thurs, 5th April 00:00 – Wed, 11th April 23:59:59
2. Details: Send Double Kinship Points to the hero in Hero’s Inn!

Next day, there is another event!
It’s called Hero Training Camp Part.2!

[Hero Training Camp Part.2]






[Event Details]
1. Period: Fri, 6th April 00:00 – Wed, 18th April 23:59:59
2. Details: Attend the Hero Training Camp for 7 days to acquire Skill Books and Stone of Infinity!
3. How to attend:
1) Clear 5 Quests to complete Daily Quest
2) Acquire Daily Quest Reward upon clearing

[Event Rewards]





[Event Note]
- Battles before the event won’t be counted
- The event will be reset at every midnight
- Event rewards will be sent to the mailbox. Unclaimed rewards cannot be recovered/reclaimed

[Room of Purification Discount!]






[Event Details]
- Period: Thurs, 12th April 00:00 – Thurs, 19th April before maintenance
- Details: 50% Gold discount in the Room of Purification

------------------

What do you think of these 3 events?
From Hero’s Inn Double Kinship to Room of Purification Discount.
Make your heroes much stronger with these events!
May Lua’s Blessing be with you!

Thank you
GM Orvel

https://news.qoo-app.com/post/83145/終極課金之作《王之襲擊》

終極課金之作《王之襲擊》

達人：3H2017-02-17 21:18014
《王之襲擊》(King’s Raid)為泰國公司出資，韓國方面作開發的跨國合作大作。遊戲畫面一流，人設亦十分養眼，戰鬥系統的構成亦可見開發者有細心設定，角色模組亦十分細膩。

然而本作系統的骨幹仍是碎片系統，開發者為了擺脫傳統碎片遊戲印象，結果為遊戲定下了一些新措施，當中最明顯的是［放棄抽角色，玩家可直接買自己想要的角色］。



玩家可以自選買角色，其實只要訂價合理，這種措施絕對是佛心。問題是本作角色的定價極高，玩家即使把1章和2章的基本關卡全通一次，所得的石還未足夠買入一個3星角色。（登場角色有20位以上）



原本把門檻拉低，讓任何玩家可以在通關後在多位角色選購自己想要的角色（想要更多就要課金），就可以創造出一個理想的平衡。現在連一個角色也買不了，令無課玩家身陷入以下狀況：
1) 長時間無法奪得新角色
2) 無特定角色，變相無法通關部分迷宮
3) 增強實力只能依靠農進化素材給基本角色
4) 只能依靠基本角色的話，玩家容易卡關，而且PVP長期被課金玩家欺壓，形成［想變強就要先增強去農資源］的死局。
簡單來說就是不課金，完全玩不下去。



這種狀況亦令之前提到的優點一下子全部被抹殺了，不課金就玩不下去，無課金玩家出走，課金玩家因參與者減少而開始脫離，課金玩家少了，營運只好推出更苛刻的集金系統，典型的惡性循環…可惜。

個人主觀評等級:

大便－－－垃圾－－－渣GAME－－－凡作－－－良作－－－佳作－－－名作－－－神作

玩家可以自選買角色，其實只要訂價合理，這種措施絕對是佛心。問題是本作角色的定價極高，玩家即使把1章和2章的基本關卡全通一次，所得的石還未足夠買入一個3星角色。（登場角色有20位以上）



原本把門檻拉低，讓任何玩家可以在通關後在多位角色選購自己想要的角色（想要更多就要課金），就可以創造出一個理想的平衡。現在連一個角色也買不了，令無課玩家身陷入以下狀況：
1) 長時間無法奪得新角色
2) 無特定角色，變相無法通關部分迷宮
3) 增強實力只能依靠農進化素材給基本角色
4) 只能依靠基本角色的話，玩家容易卡關，而且PVP長期被課金玩家欺壓，形成［想變強就要先增強去農資源］的死局。
簡單來說就是不課金，完全玩不下去。



這種狀況亦令之前提到的優點一下子全部被抹殺了，不課金就玩不下去，無課金玩家出走，課金玩家因參與者減少而開始脫離，課金玩家少了，營運只好推出更苛刻的集金系統，典型的惡性循環…可惜。

[Maintenance Notice] 5th April 2018
https://www.plug.game/kingsraid/1030449/notices#/posts/10308



Greetings, Raiders
This is GM Orvel

We will be undergoing Scheduled Maintenance on Thursday, 5th April
Please check details below

----------------------------------------------

[Maintenance Schedule]

Duration: Thurs, 5th April
America Server: 01:00-05:00 (UTC -4)
Asia Server: 12:00-16:00 (UTC +7)
EU Server: 07:00-11:00 (UTC +2)

[Maintenance Details]

▶New Costumes- School Costumes Season 2 1st (8 Heroes)
- Ricardo, Yanne, Ophelia, May, Ezekiel, Requina, Theo. Tanya

▶New Heroes
- Aselica (Knight)
- Crow (Mechanic)
- Shea (Priest)

▶New NPC Hero
- Guild NPC hero ‘Veronica’ (Wizard) will be added
- NPC hero effect: Guild Shop 10% discount

▶Hero Balance Patch
- May

▶Revamps & Adjustments
- Play Record Revamp
- Unique Treasure Ticket will be added
:: ‘Unique Treasure Ticket’ will be added to Craft menu
- Some Content Tips will be added in [Guide]
- Buff List Revamp
: Content [Shortcut] button will be added for some event buffs
- A revamp where you were able to go to the raids via [Missions] even if the raids are not open yet.
- A button will be added to a gear window which will enable you to teleport directly to the Forge.
- 28 Days Attendance Board Reward Revamp
:: Previous – Skill Book Ticket / Changed – Compiled Skill Book Ticket Box
:: Acquiring rewards will be the same
- Challenge Raid Boss: Keberen Balance Adjustment
- League of Honor Season 2 Preparation & Revamp
- Owned Ruby text revamp (Japanese Only)
- Material Item tooltip adjustments
- A Tooltip Fix where ‘Artifact’ was mistranslated to ‘Treasure’ (Japanese Only)

▶ Bug Fixes
- A bug will be fixed where Upper Dungeon Keys were not charged in Party Play Mode
- A bug will be fixed where 1st Anniversary Event icon was still displayed even after
claiming all the rewards
- Special Shop: Unnecessary tooltip will be removed from Equipment tab
- A bug will be fixed where buff list was not being folded even after clicking main screen
- A bug will be fixed where some hero skills were not being casted as intended

-----------------------------------------------------

Listed details might be changed before the maintenance
We will be back with more detailed information with Patch Note

Thank you
GM Orvel

[Patch Note] 5th April 2018

Greetings, Raiders
This is GM Orvel

Here comes the Patch Note about update details
Please find more detailed information below.

* Please be aware that all screenshots were taken from the test server.

[Update Details]-------------------------------------------

[New Costumes]

▶1st Season 2 School Costumes (8 Heroes)
- The 1st Season 2 School Costumes are added
- Effect: EXP +1% / Gold +2%


- Ezekiel, May, Requina, Tanya


- Ophelia, Yanne, Ricardo, Theo

[New Heroes]

▶ Guardian of the Sun Aselica

<Hero Info>
As a knight of the righteous heavens, she punishes evil with her sword and protects the weak
with her shield. She has descended in order to defeat the Demons who are ruining the earthly
realm. Her beautiful sword and shield are wielded to smite enemies and protect her comrades
with their light.

<Hero Background Story>

Destroy the darkness and leads into the light.
Heavenly punishment to those who threaten the world.
Blessings for the Goddess to those who protect the world.
I am Aselica.
I am the righteous guardian protecting the world of light and people in heaven.
I am the Knight of Sunlight with the grace of light and flames.
You are here to protect the world against evils.
Thy journey will never be easy.
War fire will swallow the world,
Demons shall give their best shot to stop you.
Too many of them are sacrificed already during the war.
The greater bloodshed is yet to come
But, hold onto the light of hope.
I shall guard your light.

<Hero Skill Info>
Class : Knight
Unique Weapon: Solar Halo, Ignisius
Makes a contract with the ally with the highest ATK at the start of the first battle.
Increases the target's P.DEF by 6% of Aselica's P.DEF, and also increases
Aselica's ATK by 6% of the target's ATK. This effect can't be canceled.

Unique Treasure : Guardian's Trumpet
[Judgment of the Sun] Gains Immunity to CC while in use, and increases P.DEF Boost
and M.DEF Reduction by 20%.

<Hero Skill Info>
1. Sword of the Sun
Deals M.DMG to the enemy and surrounding enemies within range, and inflicts Stun.

2. Blessing of the Sun
Imbues the Blessing of the Sun to the ally with the highest ATK, reducing cooldown of
all skills by 20% and increasing ATK 15 sec.

3. Judgment of the Sun
Takes the position, focuses to recover HP of nearby allies except for the caster 8 times and
increases their P.DEF for 5 sec. It also inflicts M.DMG on enemies 8 times within range and
decreases their M.DEF for 5 sec. After the end of the casting, recovers HP of allies within range except for the caster. It also inflicts M.DMG on enemies and knocks them down.

4. Curse of the Sun
When attacking the target, puts enemies in the Curse of the Sun state for 10 sec. Enemies
with 10 stacked Curses of the Sun will consume them and receive M.DMG,
be blinded for a while, and will have their ATK reduced for 5 sec.

<Transcendence Skill Info>

replies.msg: 當我冇講過

▶The Punishing Bullet Crow

<Hero Intro>

He was a former naval officer, but is now a bounty hunter and a troubleshooter.
He is cynical and doesn't trust people easily. His guns are categorized into three types.

<Hero Background Story>

“I would like to offer you.. A job.”
Everyone would have noticed that he was too nervous.
A man with a fancy suit holding his felt hat…
Perhaps he’d never know how business is going on in this world

“I am a bounty hunter.”
Answered a mysterious man while sitting on a huge bag. His voice and aura were too cold

“…”
His eyes are too cold..
And looks dangerous.

“I.. I mean.. More than bounty..”
This fragile man was so frightened.. And stuttered.

“S..So, I.. I heard you’d take.. Any.. Requests…”

“…”

“O.. Of course, W… With a cost.. I will give you everything I have!”
Even with the man’s desperate request, the mysterious guy was busy eating his candy.

“I am listening”

“I want you to revenge for my daughter… A bloody punishment… To the ones who killed..
My daughter..”

“…Your daughter?”

It seemed he wasn’t interested, but his eyes are changed.
Stone cold… And violent eyes.. He was overwhelmed but started to talk again.

“Can… Can you make it?”
And then he was mysterious man’s vicious smile.

“If I have to, I’d kill all the Gods.”

<Hero Info>
Class: Mechanic
Unique Weapon: Hellish Sealing Stone
The normal attack shoots an additional bullet that deals 50% of ATK as P.DMG.
When the skill ends, 'Hellhound, Akistra' is activated, increasing ATK by 30% and
Crit DMG by 30% for 10 sec. 'Hellhound, Akistra' is only activated once at 20 sec.

Unique Treasure: Pendant of Memories
[Even Gods shall Die] Gains immunity to CC during skill activation and DMG is
increased by 20%.

1. Target will be Eliminated.
Deals P.DMG to enemies in front through 15 rounds and leaves 'Hunting Dog's Fang Mark'
for 40 sec. The Hunting Dog's Fang Mark can be stacked up to 100.

2. Struggle is Meaningless. (Skill 2)
Deals P.DMG by attacking a random enemy 10 times, and shoots a Frost Bullet that
deals P.DMG to target and surrounding enemies and freezes them for 4 sec.
The special Frost Bullet creates a freezing area for 6 seconds that deals P.DMG every 2 sec,
with a 50% chance to freeze for 2 sec.

3. Even Gods shall Die.. (Skill 3)
Takes the position and focuses to shoot a laser, dealing P.DMG to frontal enemies within range, and consumes target's stack of Hunting Dog's Fang Mark to deal additional P.DMG
per each stack. Depending on the focusing time, the effect's range increases,
and DMG is increased. Once the focus is completed, knocks back the enemy far away.

4. Hunting Preparation (Skill 4)
Crow is not affected by changes in ATK Spd. Increases ATK and Crit DMG. Recovers MP
every second. It also leaves a 'Hunting Dog's Fang Mark' to target for 40 sec when dealing
a normal attack.

<Transcendence Skill Info>

▶Aria of Fantasy, Shea



<Hero Intro>
This mysterious girl heals people with her captivating tunes. She heals people with her beautiful voice and the lovely sounds of her magic harp.

<Hero Background Story>

“Hmm~“

Blowing wind made a girl open her eyes.
It was a beautiful green forest, sunlight blazing through the woods.
A girl crawled out from the next under the big tree and stretched herself.

“Huuuuooa~”

A girl with a long pink hair, big clear eyes, soft lips that make the girl look happy.
A cool breeze of the forest made the girl happy in the morning.

“Mr. Schwan, look! The morning is here.”
The girl took out her precious harp from the nest.
.
“Ok, let’s say hello to the sunlight”
At that moment, a flower flew slowly toward the girl.

“Wow! This flower is so pretty!”

“~~~”

“Ah, really?"
The girl was listening carefully to the beautiful sound coming from the harp. She looked happy.

“~~”

“Thank you fairies! It is just so beautiful~!”
Her smile looked so warm and happy. She was sending regards to the sky.

<Hero Info>

Class: Priest
Unique Weapon: Charming Melody, Schwanheite
When Trance is stacked, all skill cooldown is reduced by 10%, and recovers own Mana by 200.

Unique Treasure: Fairy's Crown
When [Red Passion Dance] is cast, silences all enemies for 2 sec,
and increases Crit DMG of all allies by 20% while it's cast.

1. Green Nature's Melody
Heals HP of all allies over 8 times. For the duration of skill, all allies take reduced DMG.
If used when Trance is stacked up to 3, this skill's Heal rate is increased by 100%
and for the duration of skill, all allies reduced DMG.

2. Blue Wind's Song
Recovers MP of all allies over 8 times, and heals HP of the target with max MP.
For the duration of skill, CC duration is reduced. If used when Trance is stacked up to 3,
this skill's MP Recovery and Heal rate is increased by 50%
and all allies will gain Immunity to CC.

3. Red Passion Dance
Deals M.DMG to all enemies over 8 times. For the duration of skill, all allies' ATK is increased.
If used when Trance is stacked up to 3, this skill's DMG and ATK Boost
are increased by 100%, and all enemies' positive effects are continuously dispelled.

4. Trance
At the end of the skill, 1 more Trance is stacked. Trance can be stacked up to max 3 times,
and if the skill is used when Trance is stacked up to 3, consumes the stack to heal
HP of all allies. Trance cannot be dispelled.

<Transcendence Skill Info>

<Hero Intro>

She is the genius from the Tower of Sage who reestablished the formula for Rune Magic.

Her strong analytical skills and Rune Magic can shackle her enemies.

<Hero Background Story>

Oh, you did a good job today.

Demon army showed up, crack between dimensions, and so on.

[Balance Patch]

▶ May
“May can craft much better potions.”



[Arena – League of Honor Updates]

▶ League of Honor Season Finale

- League of Honor Season. 1 will end on 7th April. Free- Season 2 will begin as of 8th April.
- Rank rewards will be given accordingly
:: Rewards will be sent before Regular Season. 2 via the mailbox.



- Some of League of Honor Free- Season 2 will be revamped
:: League of Honor will have limited entries (30 times a day. Resets at every midnight)
:: Tier system will be introduced.
(Participation rewards and victory rewards will be given accordingly)

[Revamps & Other Adjustments]

▶ [Shortcut] button is added to Gear window
- You can activate [Forge] button on the gear window.
- You can teleport to the Forge by pressing the button.

▶New NPC Friendship Items
- New NPC hero Friendship items are added that can be given to Veronica



▶ Raid Mission Issue Revamp

- An issue has been revamped where users were able to enter Raids via Raid Missions even if
they did not meet the conditions

▶ Play Record System Revamp
- You will be able to check ‘Accumulated Log In Rewards’ in Play Record
:: Click Play Record – [View Reward] to see the progress.

- Play Record menus are added.
:: We will try our best to bring other menus as soon as possible

▶ 28 Days Attendance Board Reward Item Revamp
- Skill Book Ticket will be changed to ‘Compiled Skill Book Ticket Box’.
:: Acquirable rewards will be the same.

▶More [Guide] will be added
- [Guide] for Unique Treasure, Class Unique Weapon, Lua’s Token will be added.

▶ Buff content [Shortcut] button will be added to the Buff List
- You will be able to teleport to the chosen buff content by clicking [Shortcut] button
in the Buff List.

▶Chapter Balance Adjustment
- Chapter.2 – Chapter.5 will be harder
- Monster ATK will increase accordingly.

▶Hot time Event Buff Icon Revamp



▶Scenario Quest Clear Condition Change
- Previous: Acquire EXP by using an item, Send Amity Points, Finish crafting an item
- Changed: Equip an Empty Flask, Send & Receive Amity Points, Start crafting an item

▶Owned Ruby text revamp (Japanese Only)
- Free/Paid Ruby text has been changed

[Bug Fixes]

▶1st Anniversary Event Icon (Gladi) Display bug has been fixed
- Fixed a bug where the icon was still displayed even after claiming all rewards.

▶ Fixed a bug where Upper Dungeon Keys were not charged in Party Play Mode

▶ Special Shop: Unnecessary tooltip will be removed from Equipment tab

▶ Main Screen Buff List / Left Menu List function revamp
- Fixed a bug where buff list was not being folded even after clicking the main screen.
- Fixed a bug where Web- view events were displayed on the menu list at the left side
m of the screen

▶ Fixed a bug where some hero skills were not being casted as intended
- Ophelia: Fixed a bug where Card of Fortune – Vellekia (Skill 3)[Fortune] mana recovery was
being activated without the card.
- Fixed a bug where Lorraine’s Unique Treasure effects were applied to the enemy
who did not have 5 stacks of Poison.

▶ Item Tooltip Fixes
- NPC hero Friendship item crafting material tooltip fix
:: You can purchase crafting materials in the Hero’s Inn.
- A Tooltip Fix where ‘Artifact’ was mistranslated to ‘Treasure’ (Japanese Only)

-------------------------------------------

This is all for today’s update
I hope you enjoy the updated content

Thank you
GM Orvel
